summary: A small-time thief steals a car and impulsively murders a motorcycle policeman. Wanted by the authorities, he reunites with a hip American journalism student and attempts to persuade her to run away with him to Italy.
cast: Jean Seberg|Jean-Paul Belmondo|Daniel Boulanger|Henri-Jacques Huet|Roger Hanin|Van Doude|Claude Mansard|Liliane Dreyfus|Michel Fabre|Jean-Pierre Melville|Jean-Luc Godard|Richard Balducci|André S. Labarthe|François Moreuil|Jacques Lourcelles|Liliane Robin|Gérard Brach|Philippe de Broca|José Bénazéraf|Jean Domarchi|Jean Douchet|Raymond Huntley|Louiguy|Michel Mourlet|Guido Orlando|Madame Paul|Jean-Louis Richard|Jacques Serguine|Jacques Siclier|Virginie Ullmann|Emile Villion
title: Al final de la escapada
